Uses of Package
pxchat.net.tcp

Packages that use pxchat.net.tcp
pxchat.net   
pxchat.net.protocol.core   
pxchat.net.tcp   
 

Classes in pxchat.net.tcp used by pxchat.net
TCPClient
          The TCP clients adds the TCPClient.connect(String, int) method to the CustomSocket in order for it to be used as a simple client.
TCPClientListener
          The TCPClientListener interface contains the callbacks used to react to client events.
TCPServer
          This class implements a non-blocking server using the TCP protocol.
TCPServerListener
          This interface contains the callbacks used to react to events generated by a server and the clients connected to id.
 

Classes in pxchat.net.tcp used by pxchat.net.protocol.core
CustomSocket
          This class implements a socket that is able to read and write encrypted objects to a TCP socket using object input and object output streams.
 

Classes in pxchat.net.tcp used by pxchat.net.tcp
CustomSocket
          This class implements a socket that is able to read and write encrypted objects to a TCP socket using object input and object output streams.
CustomSocket.ReadThread
          A thread that waits for incoming encrypted data.
TCPClientListener
          The TCPClientListener interface contains the callbacks used to react to client events.
TCPServer.AcceptThread
          The accept thread waits until a new client connects and calls the callback method afterwards.
TCPServerListener
          This interface contains the callbacks used to react to events generated by a server and the clients connected to id.
